summary: Adds a new section to Vlindrel Hall at Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.silgradmodding.org/files/cropped-tesvst-banner.jpg[/img]


************************************************************************************************************************************
 [url=http://silgradmodding.org]Silgrad Tower[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/pages/Silgrad-Tower-From-the-Ashes/313166952031396?sk=infohttp://]Silgrad Tower FB[/url]

[url=http://silgradmodding.org/forum/index.php?page=Thread&postID=192712#post192712]Thread at ST.[/url]
************************************************************************************************************************************

[youtube]-xlMtbSwLdA[/youtube]

************************************************************************************************************************************

A mod I made for fun, I like the architecture and because I required more storage space.
I am planning to add a basement section as well.

The fire place of the original layout in the back (items enabled through the guest bed room) has been moved to the end of the new section. The esp can used with or without purchasing the available upgrades.

Install: tick the StSrVlinHall.esp  --> uninstall: untick the StSrVlinHall.esp.


Adds a.o. a lot of storage space -->  4 shield plaques, 2 weapon racks, 1 book shelf (54 books), 4 chests, harvestable plants, 2 ingredient containers, 2 dagger display cases, 6 display cases, 8 weapon plaques & 4 mannequins.
author: Silgrad Tower
